items.raw_desc: Tea Basilur Christmas Spice Chai Assorted 40× 2 g:Do you enjoy drinking tea and do you like to enjoy it in the peace and quiet of your own home? Then you will definitely love Basilur tea. Black tea has been known to mankind since the 16th century. Production begins with the harvesting of Chinese or Assam tea leaves. The next step is the so-called. wilting, which is the process by which water evaporates from the petals. The leaves are then rolled. The resulting taste, aroma and colour of the tea depend on the oxidation, which is one of the final treatments. Oxidation is stopped by rapid heating, e.g. pan-frying, steaming or baking. You will receive Basilur tea in a pack of 80 g. Main advantages of Basilur Christmas Spice Chai Assorted 40 × 2 g Let yourself be carried away by a cup of delicious tea Black tea has a typical taste that is pleasantly earthy The package has a total weight of 80 g

In that case, you will certainly love Basilur tea. Black tea has been known to mankind since the 16th century. The beginning of production is at the harvest of Chinese or Assam tea leaves. The next step is the so-called. wilting, which is the process by which water evaporates from the petals. Subsequently, they are scrolled. The final stage is the oxidation process, which gives the tea its final flavour, aroma and colour. The oxidation process is stopped by rapid heating, e.g. pan-frying, steaming or baking. CERESIT CE 40 je k dispozici v balení 2 kg a 5 kg a je vhodná pro použití jak v interiéru, tak i exteriéru. items.raw_desc: Fugázó massza Ceresit CE 40 Fugázóanyag, coal, 2 kg:CERESIT CE 40 AQUASTATIC je flexibilní, voděodolná spárovací hmota s Color Perfect technologií, určená pro spárování keramických obkladů a dlažeb, včetně gresových, skla, mozaiky, přírodního kamene a mramoru. Vhodná pro spáry do šířky 8 mm, je ideální do prostor vystavených vysoké vlhkosti, jako jsou koupelny, sprchy, kuchyně, balkóny, terasy či lodžie. Díky své odolnosti proti výkvětům, změně barvy a vzniku trhlin či poškrábání zaručuje dlouhotrvající a intenzivní barvu. Snadno se čistí a chrání proti plísním a houbám, což ji činí vhodnou pro mokré a vlhké místnosti s podlahovým vytápěním. CERESIT CE 40 je k dispozici v balení 2 kg a 5 kg a je vhodná pro použití jak v interiéru, tak i exteriéru. items.raw_desc: Ragasztó Ceresit CX 10, univerzális, poliuretán:A Ceresit CX 10 egy univerzális poliuretán ragasztó, amely sokoldalú megoldást kínál különféle építőanyagok rögzítésére.  Ideális beton- és pórusbeton elemek, téglák, fa, gipszkarton, OSB lapok, laminátum, üveg, PVC és más anyagok ragasztásához. items.raw_desc: Tea Basilur Specialty English Breakfast 100 g:Have you fallen in love with drinking tea and enjoy it in the peace and quiet of your home? In that case, Basilur tea is perfect for you. Black tea was first mentioned in China at the end of the 16th century. The beginning of production is at the harvest of Chinese or Assam tea leaves. The next step is called petal wilting, in which the excess water evaporates. Subsequently, they are scrolled. The oxidation process, which is part of the final treatment, gives the tea its final flavour, aroma and colour. Oxidation is stopped by rapid heating, e.g. pan-frying, steaming or baking. Basilur tea is supplied in a package with a total weight of 100 g.
